column1: git init: initializes an existing directory as a Git repository
git clone: retrieve an entire repository from a hosted location via URL
git add: add a file as it looks now to your next commit (stage)
git commit: commit your staged content as a new commit snapshot
git push: Transmit local branch commits to the remote repository branch
git pull: fetch and merge any commits from the tracking remote branch
git branch: list your branches. a * will appear next to the currently active branch
git checkout: switch to another branch and check it out into your working directory
git merge: merge the specified branchâ€™s history into the current one
